title: Plan Exploration Drilling Program
description: An exploration geologist plans a diamond drilling program to test a new geophysical anomaly for potential mineralization.

tasks.description: Define the target area based on the geophysical survey results.
tasks.expected_outcome: The target for drilling is clearly defined on a map.

tasks.description: Design the layout of the proposed drillholes, specifying their location, azimuth, dip, and planned total depth.
tasks.expected_outcome: A set of planned drillholes is designed to optimally test the target.

tasks.description: Estimate the total cost of the drilling program and prepare a proposal for management approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: A costed proposal is generated to support the funding request.
